title: How to Do a Pinch Harmonic (false Harmonic or Squeal)

steps.title: Set your guitar to the bridge pickup.
steps.content: Set your guitar to the bridge pickup.

steps.title: Hold down any fret, on any string, this works best on natural harmonic notes.
steps.content: Hold down any fret, on any string, this works best on natural harmonic notes. In standard tuning a really simple one of these is on the 12th fret, any string.

steps.title: Choke up on your pick so there is only about a half or quarter centimeter showing.
steps.content: Choke up on your pick so there is only about a half or quarter centimeter showing.

steps.title: Pick the note, but barely brush your thumb across the string as you pick it (should be one motion).
steps.content: Pick the note, but barely brush your thumb across the string as you pick it (should be one motion).

steps.title: Put a nice vibrato on the note (optional).
steps.content: Put a nice vibrato on the note (optional).

steps.title: Place your hand on the strings.
steps.content: Place your hand on the strings.

steps.title: With your thumb, barely place the knuckle on the top of the string.
steps.content: With your thumb, barely place the knuckle on the top of the string.

steps.title: With the finger that is picking it, pluck the note fast.
steps.content: With the finger that is picking it, pluck the note fast.
